item.title: How I learned DIY auto repair
item.description: Ever since dealing with a crap car, it became clear I needed to learn more about cars. So here's how I did that! I focused on the process because there's already plenty of resources out there for specific repairs. I felt it would be helpful to look at how I prepared to do rust removal on my car as an example to share. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: putz
